original: Lindeman, Anders Fridolf, distrikts-iantmätare. Mariestad, f. 25/6/81 i Säbrå, Västernorrl. 1., av kyrkoh. Anders Emil L. o. Benedicta Sundblad. G. 07 m. Anna Lovisa Öhmann. Barn: Gunvor f. 08, Barbro 14. — Stud:ex. 02, lantmät:ex. 05. Tjg. v. jordregistret i Skarab. 1. 12-18, e. lantmät. i Kalmar 1. 18-20, distr :’lantmät. i Mariestads s. distr. sed. 21. Ordf. i hamnstyr. 25-33, led. av stadsfullm. 26-38, av drätselkamm. 21-29, stadsrev. sed. 35, överförmynd. sed. 40, fd. led. av Mariestads landst :fören. o. ordf. i Mod. valmansfören., ordf. i Mariestads skyttegille. RVO 33.
translated: Lindeman, Anders Fridolf, district surveyor. Mariestad, b. 25/6/81 in Säbrå, Västernorrl. 1st son of clergyman Anders Emil L. and Benedicta Sundblad. Married in 1907 to Anna Lovisa Öhmann. Children: Gunvor b. 1908, Barbro b. 1914. Completed secondary school exams in 1902, surveyor exams in 1905. Worked for the land registry in Skaraborg county from 1912-1918, as a surveyor in Kalmar county from 1918-1920, and as a district surveyor in Mariestad's southern district since 1921. Chairman of the port authority from 1925-1933, member of the city council from 1926-1938, member of the finance committee from 1921-1929, city auditor since 1935, guardian since 1940, former member of the Mariestad county association and chairman of the Modern Voters Association, Chairman of the Mariestad Shooting Guild. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa in 1933.
